name: rescape-ramda
description: Ramda utilities for the Rescape platform

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build-es5
scripts.build-es5: mkdir -p dist && babel src --out-dir dist --ignore spec.js --plugins=transform-es2015-modules-commonjs --source-maps inline
scripts.build-publish-patch: npm run build && npm run test && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.build-publish-minor: npm run build && npm run test && npm version minor && npm publish

author: Andy Likuski
